equip.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to provide a person or place with the things that are needed for a particular kind of activity or work
equip.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: They spent a lot of money equipping the school with new computers.
He equipped himself with a hammer and nails.
The rooms are equipped with video cameras.
The emergency services are equipped to deal with disasters of this kind.
equip.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to give someone the information and skills that they need to do something
equip.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: We equip students with the skills they will need once they leave college.
training that will equip you for the job
We must equip young teachers to deal with difficult children.
